title: HNP Esports is now recruiting!

embed.description: Please fill out the following survey if you are interested in playing for HNP. Plat II and above only.

body:
Hi guys! 
HNP Esports is currently accepting applications for plat 2+ players :) 
We're an upcoming team who compete in regular tournaments and going to take play in the upcoming OOL.
If you're interested, click on the link and fill out the form!
